description: electric power (instantaneous output or installed capacity)
electric energy (or installed energy capacity) - needs to be consistent with the power units!
real cost for a constant base year
heat rate of a thermal power plant - specifies how much fuel is required to deliver a unit of electric energy
the emission intensity a fuel expresses how much carbon emissions are emitted when a unit of fuel energy is burned
the cost of fuel per unit of fuel energy
the variable operations & maintenance cost per unit of electric energy
the annual fixed operations & maintenance cost per unit of electric capacity
the annual fixed operations & maintenance cost per unit of electric energy capacity
the annual capital cost per unit of electric capacity
the annual capital cost per unit of electric energy capacity
